title: Game surrender before 15 minutes without afk on Summoner's Rift

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Does anyone know how this game was able to be surrendered before 15 minutes?

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/165976674/200063252/eog?tab=overview

replies.body:
Ryze bought items then dc'd.

You only need to be dc'd for 90 of the first 180 seconds of a game to force  remake. So someone could load in and leave before the 1 min mark and a remake can still occur.
Alternatively, he reconnected to the game and bought items just as the vote was cast.
